issues.title: Create voter registration page
issues.description:
Build a page where users can learn about voter registration requirements and find links to register in their state.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Display state-specific requirements
- Links to official registration sites
- Check registration status
- Mobile responsive design

issues.title: Add candidate comparison feature
issues.description:
Allow users to compare two or more candidates side-by-side.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Create comparison UI component
- [ ] Fetch candidate data from API
- [ ] Display positions on key issues
- [ ] Add print/share functionality

issues.title: Implement user authentication
issues.description:

**Technical Details:**
- Use NextAuth.js
- Support email/password and OAuth

- Add password reset flow
